AccountServicePreference.name: AccountServicePreference
AccountServicePreference.description: Represents the preferences an account has for the services they receive. In Home Health, this object represents the preferences that a patient has for the health workers assigned to their visits.

AccountId.description: The patient whose preference is being recorded.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

PreferenceId.description: The Preference that the patient has about their health worker. This preference may be a skill or trait, or a specific person that they want to avoid or be assigned to their visit.

PreferenceOrder.description: The order of the preference selected by the patient.

PreferenceType.description: Specifies the type of preferences thatâ€™s recorded.

ServiceContextId.description: References the work type that this preference is valid for. For instance, a patient may have a certain preference that only applies to physiotherapy and another preference that only applies to wound management.

UsageType.description: Specifies the feature that the created record is applicable for.
